items.value: @if(equals(activity('Get Pipelines Details to run').output.resultSetCount,0),variables('EmptyArray'),activity('Get Pipelines Details to run').output.resultSets[0].rows)

activities.name: If should wait for ADF Pipeline run completion

ifTrueActivities.name: Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion

pipeline.referenceName: Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion

dependsOn.activity: Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion

value.content: @if(contains(activity('Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion').output.pipelineReturnValue,'ReturnValueObject'),activity('Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion').output.pipelineReturnValue.ReturnValueObject,null)

@if(contains(activity('Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion').output.pipelineReturnValue,'PipelineRunFailedString'),activity('Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion').output.pipelineReturnValue.PipelineRunFailedString,null)

dependsOn.activity: Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion

message.value: @if(equals(activity('Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion').Error.message,''),'No Error Message',activity('Wait for ADF Pipeline Run Completion').Error.message)

scripts.text:
select
 [SchemaName] = schema_name(v.schema_id)
,[ViewName] = v.name
,[TableName] = substring(v.name,4,len(v.name)-3)
from sys.views v
where schema_name(v.schema_id) = 'powerbi'

activities.name: Copy all PowerBI Views To Tables

message.value: @concat('Requested Pipeline Run Status: ',activity('Get Pipeline Run Status').output.status,if(contains(activity('Get Pipeline Run Status').output,'cancelledBy'),concat('; Cancelled By: ',activity('Get Pipeline Run Status').output.cancelledBy),''),'; Error Message: ',activity('Get Pipeline Run Status').output.message)
